overview: After all being grounded, Adria Rae and Jill Kassidy start to make out on the bed while Paige Owens exclaims that she's not having fun. They make their reluctant friend melt beneath their sensual touches. Kristen Scott knocks on the door to a suburban home and says that she baked some treats to welcome the new family to the neighborhood. Sabina Rouge leads her to the bedroom and invites her to get comfortable. Sitting next to each other in the bedroom, Lilly Ford admits she's never kissed a guy before. Scarlett Sage can't believe it! They kiss, slowly and gently.
title: Naughty in Bed
